channel.title: Motivation - Dezible
channel.description: My name is Aditya Bhardwaj and am currently a PhD candidate at University of Twente - you can find me here through LinkedIn profile As the area of AI progresses, a number of people are sharing tutorials (about agents, LLMs and whatnot). Often times, these are singular projects which end up with others in project graveyard. I want to change that. My aim is to stick to some projects and build them incrementally. This way, I get to learn and apply new concepts.
